attributes.action: ban the use of unpaid work experience and internships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unpaid internships and work experience placements for school and university leavers ensure that only young people whose parents can afford to fund them get a foothold on certain career paths.  
These leads to a lack of meritocracy, poor social mix and cohesion and denies talented but poorer young people opportunities. 
Paid internships should be advertised on a central clearing website and should be allocated on merit not connections.
